name: Bookmarks Analizer
short description: Bookmarks analyzer help to delete duplicate bookmarks and empty folders.
description: Bookmarks Analyzer helps users clean and organize their bookmarks by providing the following functionalities: * Detects and deletes duplicate bookmarks. * Identifies and removes empty folders. * Allows deletion of duplicates within specific folders or including subfolders. * Displays how many times a bookmark appears across folders. * Provides tools to manage bookmarks and folders efficiently.
